module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top 1 * FROM RedEnvelope WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (datediff(day,CreatedTime,getdate())=0) ORDER BY RedEnveId DESC

declare @exist int begin select @exist=count(1) from RedEnvelope where CircleId=@CircleId and (datediff(day,CreatedTime,getdate())=0) if(@exist=0) begin INSERT INTO RedEnvelope(CircleId,Income,Pay,CreatedTime) VALUES (@CircleId,@Income,0,getdate()) end else begin UPDATE RedEnvelope SET Income=Income+@Income WHERE CircleId=@CircleId AND (datediff(day,CreatedTime,getdate())=0) end end
UPDATE RedEnvelope SET Pay=Pay+@Pay WHERE CircleId=@CircleId AND (datediff(day,CreatedTime,getdate())=0)
